text: Georgi Aleksandrovich Yartsev (; 11 April 1948 – 15 July 2022) was a Russian footballer and manager. He was the head coach of the Russia national team between 2003 and 2005. He played for the Soviet Union national football team from 1978 to 1979. From 1977 to 1980, he played for FC Spartak Moscow. Yartsev was born in Kostromskoy District, then-Soviet Union. Yartsev died on 15 July 2022 in Moscow, Russia from a heart attack, aged 74.Источник: скончался бывший тренер сборной России Георгий Ярцев ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian football managers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Georgi Yartsev
